name: phonebook-backend
description: Backend for phonebook app - exercise for Full Stack Open

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd '../Full Stack open/part2/phonebook' && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse '../../../Phonebook Backend'
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy

author: Andrew Padgett
